description.value:
The Patron you choose lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you.

The Celestial
Spell LevelSpells
cantrip@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplGuidance00]{Guidance}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplThaumaturg]{Thaumaturgy}
1st@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCureWounds]{Cure Wounds}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplGuidingBol]{Guiding Bolt}
2nd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.WuCsvZ6j3fbKbrDg]{Flaming Sphere}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.QT4ZC1NmcGbDAsFx]{Lesser Restoration}
3rd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDaylight00]{Daylight}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplRevivify00]{Revivify}
4th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplGuardianFa]{Guardian of Faith}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplWallOfFire]{Wall of Fire}
